bibdata.title: IEEE Draft Standard for Spectrum Sensing Interfaces and Data Structures for Dynamic Spectrum Access and other Advanced Radio Communication Systems.
Corrigendum 1
IEEE Draft Standard for Spectrum Sensing Interfaces and Data Structures for Dynamic Spectrum Access and other Advanced Radio Communication Systems. - Corrigendum 1

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: This corrigendum to IEEE Std 1900.6TM-2011 modifies terms and definitions in response to comments received during the approval process of the IEEE Std 1900.1aTM-2012 and the IEEE Std 1900.6aTM-2014 that could not be considered in the 1900.6a. These corrections align the use of terms and definitions in the 1900.6 with their use in scope of the 1900.1 standard.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
